name: Tenebrous Hotel
description:
A puzzle game where you've two dimensions one for the main character one for the ghost. You move with W A S D or arrow keys and you switch characters with shift. 

art, animation, polish, sound design, level design byRyder Studios

Programming, level design  byXtopy

Music made by Chris Kohler

Download Instructions

Download the .zip File

  • extract it
  • rename the ''BenBonkJammin_Data'' into ''g_Data'' (sorry we did a mistake here, we'll fix it after the jam)
  • click on .exe file inside the folder
  • have fun playing
